Role Description: Installs, maintains, and repairs computer hardware.
trial_1:
- Hands-on bench test (diagnose/repair a seeded hardware fault; score accuracy, speed, ESD safety)
- Structured scenario interview with anchored scoring (e.g., intermittent issues, RMA triage, parts inventory)
- Documentation work sample (write a troubleshooting SOP/checklist)
- Standardized reference checks focused on reliability and quality
- If still tied, a randomized draw with both candidates’ consent
trial_2:
- Run a short paid work sample (e.g., diagnose and repair a faulted board, document steps, estimate MTTR)
- Structured panel with the same technical scenarios (intermittent fault isolation, ESD-safe rework, BGA/reflow decisioning, firmware flashing/DFU recovery)
- Rubric-based reference checks on reliability, ESD discipline, documentation quality, and on-call performance
- Trial period or contract-to-hire with predefined success metrics
- If still tied after job-relevant methods, use a random selection process
